naslov: Prodaja - Rezidencijalna vila s bazenom 600 m2 - Remete (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaja - Rezidencijalna vila s bazenom 600 m2 - Remete Prošećite nekretninom na linku: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=8HuomNB8NyQ Prodajemo prekrasnu obiteljska vilu NKP 600m2 (BRP 675m2) na zemljištu 1.000 m2 koja se nalazi uz rub zelenog pojasa na Remetama. Izgrađena je 2015. po standardima ambasade. Razvedena u tri etaže. Podrum: garaža za dva automobila, praonica rublja, prostor za smještaj tehnike, izba, kotlovnica, wc, prostor za druženje s vinskim podrumom, wellness sa saunom, tušem i jaccuzijem, fitness/teretana, prostorija za bazensku tehniku, spremište za vrtni alat i hodnik. Prizemlje: ulazni prostor, hodnik, kuhinja, wc, gostinjska soba s kupaonicom, dnevni boravak, blagovaonica, prostor uz kamin, vanjska terasa s bazenom i pogledom na šumu. 1. Kat: glavna spavaća soba s kupaonicom, garderobom, terasom i pripadajućom galerijom, tri dječje spavaće sobe, svaka s vlastitom kupaonicom i pripadajućom galerijom. Izuzetno kvalitetno građena, opremljena s vanjskim bazenom, saunom, vinskim podrumom, velikim garažama, te dva lifta (gospodarski i za vlasnika zasebni). Također ima odvojen ulaz za osiguranje. Pristupna staza vili je grijana, popločena kamenom Kashmir white, pristupna rampa prema garaži grijana s protukliznim završni slojem, vanjska terasa opločena keramikom i kamenom Travertinom, vanjska terasa uz roštilj, bazen s pripadajućim površinama opločenih Travertinom. Pametna kuća (upravljanje grijanjem, hlađenjem, videonadzorom...), indirektna i direktna rasvjeta, lusteri Murano, podno i zidno grijanje. Vila je idealna za rezidenciju, ali i za poslovnu namjenu. ______________________________________________________ Sale - Residential Villa with Pool 600 m2 - Remete Take a virtual tour of the property at the following link: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=8HuomNB8NyQ We are selling a beautiful family villa with a net floor area of 600 m2 (gross floor area of 675 m2) on a 1,000 m2 plot, located on the edge of a green belt in Remete. Built in 2015 to embassy standards, the villa is spread over three levels. Basement: Garage for two cars, laundry room, technical equipment room, pantry, boiler room, toilet, social area with wine cellar, wellness area with sauna, shower, and jacuzzi, fitness/gym, pool equipment room, garden tool storage, and hallway. Ground Floor: Entrance area, hallway, kitchen, toilet, guest room with bathroom, living room, dining room, fireplace area, outdoor terrace with pool and forest view. First Floor: Master bedroom with bathroom, wardrobe, terrace, and gallery, three children's bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and gallery. Exceptionally well-built, equipped with an outdoor pool, sauna, wine cellar, large garages, and two elevators (one service and one private for the owner). There is also a separate entrance for security. The driveway to the villa is heated, paved with Kashmir white stone, the access ramp to the garage is heated with an anti-slip finish, the outdoor terrace is paved with ceramic tiles and Travertine stone, the outdoor terrace with a barbecue area, the pool area is paved with Travertine stone. The villa is a smart home (heating, cooling, video surveillance...), with indirect and direct lighting, Murano chandeliers, underfloor and wall heating. The villa is ideal for a residence but also suitable for business purposes. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Petrinjska 22, Zagreb Federica Grisogona 8, Zadar
